entry.title: FLORENTINE FINISH LARGE THICK ROUND HOOP EARRINGS
entry.summary:
Vendor: CAROLINA BUCCI
Type: EARRINGS
Price: 2735.00

Our signature Florentine Finish is achieved by beating each piece with a diamond tipped tool, which leaves permanent faceted dents in the gold. 

Made from 18k Yellow Gold, these Large Round Thick Hoops are approximately 4.5cm in diameter.

Please note that as each product is made by hand, there may be slight natural variations in the length or tone of pieces.

entry.title: *pre-order* LUCKY NECKLACE WITH PEACE CHARM
entry.summary:
Vendor: CAROLINA BUCCI
Type: NECKLACE
Price: 2900.00

The Lucky Necklace is Carolina Bucci's extension of the classic Lucky Bracelet, inspired by the cotton friendship bracelets of her childhood. 

18k Yellow Gold diamond-cut chain, hand braided with Beige silk and finished with a Peace Charm.

The versatility of this piece allows it to be worn both as a necklace or wrap bracelet. Double knot and make a wish when tying.

Each necklace is approximately 95cm, including 4.5cm long tassels on either end.

Please note that as each product is made by hand, there may be slight natural variations in the length or tone of pieces.

entry.title: FLORENTINE FINISH CUORE HEART HOOP EARRINGS
entry.summary:
Vendor: CAROLINA BUCCI
Type: EARRING
Price: 2195.00

Carolina Bucci's signature Florentine Finish is achieved by beating each piece with a diamond tipped tool, which leaves permanent faceted indentations in the gold. 

Crafted from 18-karat gold in the shape of a loveheart, they've been carefully hammered with a diamond-tipped tool to create the designer's signature 'Florentine' finish. They're sleek and small enough to complement outfits, instead of being the focal point.

Made from either 18k Yellow Gold, these hoops are approximately 3cm in diameter.

Please note that as each product is made by hand, there may be slight natural variations in the length or tone of pieces.

entry.title: FORTE BEADS GLASSES KIT IN RAINBOW
entry.summary:
Vendor: CAROLINA BUCCI
Type: JEWELRY
Price: 1595.00

FORTE Beads is a collection based around a rainbow of precious hard-stone beads strung onto Lurex cords. Carolina Bucci's FORTE  Beads Glasses kit comes with 60 vibrant hard stone beads in a preset rainbow of colours and a sun cord.

The FORTE Beads glasses sun colour Lurex cords feature beautifully crafted Florentine Finish end caps in 18k yelloww Gold

Create your own distinctive designs by unscrewing the rubber loop and threading on the beads. 18k Gold Beads and Florentine Finish Letters can be bought separately to personalise your look.

Each new combination is a unique expression of how you live today, how you feel today… Easy to construct and just as easy to deconstruct and start again.

The FORTE Beads Glasses kit features adjustable rubber loops which fit easily over the arms of your favourite sunglasses or reading glasses.

entry.title: FORTE FLORENTINE FINISH LETTER G
entry.summary:
Vendor: CAROLINA BUCCI
Type: BRACELET
Price: 1095.00

Add our 18k gold Letters to your FORTE Beads necklace or bracelet to create your personalised look. Each of our Florentine Finish letters have been meticulously crafted in our Atelier with our signature finish created with a diamond tipped tool that leaves shimmering indents.

All of the 18k Gold Letters are sold individually and can be ordered if currently unavailable...all special orders take approximately 6-8 weeks.

All fine jewelry is final sale.

Price: 2295.00

Available in 18k Yellow Gold, the Small Heart Pendant is approximately 1.5cm tall and features a classic Carolina Bucci Link

This piece is meant to be worn with any of her classic chains, Discoball necklaces, Lucky Necklaces or Forte Bead Kits.

Please note that as each product is made by hand, there may be slight natural variations in the length or tone of pieces.

entry.title: FORTE BEADS RAINBOW NECKLACE AND BRACELET MULTI-KIT
entry.summary:
Vendor: CAROLINA BUCCI
Type: NECKLACE
Price: 2195.00

FORTE Beads is a collection based around a rainbow of precious hard-stone beads. Each necklace and bracelet is a unique expression of your style today, how you feel today… Easy to construct and just as easy to deconstruct and start again.

Our FORTE Beads Necklace and Bracelet Kit comes with 84 vibrant hard-stone beads in a preset rainbow of colours, two Florentine Finish 18k Gold beads and a bracelet and necklace cord in the colour of your choice. 

The FORTE Beads collection offers four exclusive colour Lurex cords to choose from, with beautifully crafted Florentine Finish end caps in 18k Gold: 

Storm, Gunmetal, Sun & Moon 

Create your own distinctive designs by threading on the beads and tying the cord to your preferred length. The FORTE Beads Necklace can be easily styled as a wrap bracelet or choker, allowing you to express your personal style in a creative way everyday. Additional 18k Gold beads and Florentine Finish 18k letters can be bought separately to personalise your look.

Enjoy Playing!

entry.title: FORTE BEADS MOONBOW NECKLACE AND BRACELET MULTI-KIT
entry.summary:
Vendor: CAROLINA BUCCI
Type: NECKLACE
Price: 2195.00

FORTE Beads is a collection based around a rainbow of precious hard-stone beads. Each necklace and bracelet is a unique expression of your style today, how you feel today… Easy to construct and just as easy to deconstruct and start again.

Carolina Bucci's FORTE Beads Moonbow Necklace and Bracelet MultiKit comes with 84 vibrant hard-stone beads in a preset moonbow of colours, two Florentine Finish 18k Yellow Gold beads and a bracelet and necklace cord in the Sun Colour. 
The FORTE Beads collection offers 2 gorgeous Sun Lurex cords, with beautifully crafted Florentine Finish end caps in 18k Yellow Gold. 

Create your own distinctive designs by threading on the beads and tying the cord to your preferred length. Each cord is 'one size fits all' simply thread the beads on and tie the cord to your preferred length. Remove or add beads to adjust the size to suit your wrist. We recommend tying a double knot, pulled tightly, for a secure fit. Use the extra beads to change the combination of your bracelet. 

The FORTE Beads Necklace can be easily styled as a wrap bracelet or choker, allowing you to express your personal style in a creative way everyday. Additional 18k Gold beads and Florentine Finish 18k letters can be bought separately to personalise your look.

Enjoy Playing!

The Lucky Bracelet is Carolina Bucci's take on the classic cotton friendship bracelets of her childhood.

This bracelet is meant to be worn alone or layered. Double knot and make a wish when tying.
